org.cse.client
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
              org.cse.client.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.HistoryListener, Application, Validatable
public class Controller
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
implements Application, com.google.gwt.user.client.HistoryListener, Validatable

The controller provides with utilities which include: I18NFactory, UIHelper, Application implementation and notifications via ChangeListener

Author:
KBac

getTagProvider

public TagProvider getTagProvider()
Description copied from interface: Application
Each user id can in effect be used to fetch associated tags from a BookmarkProvider. Therefore application is to expose current TagProvider instance which is created after fetching the Tags.

Specified by:
getTagProvider in interface Application
Returns:
instance of TagProvider which is currently setup
